reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits true to size and appreciate its elegant design with shiny sequins. The dress receives positive feedback for its quality, color accuracy, comfort, and stretchability, making it suitable for formal events including Mardi Gras-themed parties and milestone birthday celebrations. However, several customers report issues with sequins falling off the dress. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress
items.body: Beautiful dress and excellent quality. The fabric is a bit stretchy, and very comfortable. The fit was perfect. I love the midi length below my knees. It’s a stunning dress. Read more
items.author: Susan Grube

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality and Fit
items.body: Definitely Elegant and Sassy Read more
items.author: Dr. Sherry

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, Colorful and Sexy at a great Price!
items.body: I love, love, love my dress. I will be wearing it at my next royal blue event. It fits perfectly. The dress was true to size. I received many compliments walking to the event from individuals. Even while standing at a crosswalk from people in their cars. The quality and price of the dress is of great value. The dress was as pictured on the site. I only lost one fringe off of the dress. Read more
items.author: Sharon

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Dress
items.body: This Dress looks expensive! Hugs in all the right places. I am 5’10 and weigh 164 fits perfect. I wore it for the first time last night, and what I don’t like about it is the long sleeves snag the sequins on the dress. My arm would get attached to the sequins and pull on both pieces, i’m gonna go ahead and return it and probably go with a short sleeve version of this because the dress is super flattering Read more
items.author: Jody

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Christmas party hit!!
items.body: Absolutely love this dress! I sized down and it was the perfect choice. I normally wear a large, but the medium fit beautifully thanks to the stretch. Super flattering and comfortable. For reference, I’m 5'7" and 162 lbs. Read more
items.author: Narrie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars HEAVY!
items.body: This is a beautiful dress, it runs a little large, it's heavy and appears darker than the photo! Read more
items.author: BamaBling

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the color of the picture
items.body: Dress is beautiful and well made. I would give it five stars but for the color. The dress was supposed to be red. The picture shows it as a vibrant red color but it is not. The color I received was actually a reddish brown. Other than that it is a wonderful dress for the price just dissatisfied with the color difference from the picture. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Dress
items.body: This dress was true to size. I received so many compliments on it. I will definitely be ordering in other colors Read more
items.author: Ebony Reid

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening Bodycon Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Evening Bodycon Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Purple-ss, Blackgold-3, Blue, Black-2, Black-silver Cold Shoulder, Red Short Sleeve, Purple Short Sleeve, Black, Red, White Short Sleeve-2, Blue Short Sleeve, Black Short Sleeve, White, Green Cold Shoulder. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
